results.definition: move back and forth or sideways
examples: She rocked back and forth on her feet

cause to move back and forth

results.definition: a lump or mass of hard consolidated mineral matter
examples: he threw a rock at me

results.definition: (figurative) someone who is strong and stable and dependable
examples: he was her rock during the crisis
Thou art Peter, and upon this rock I will build my church
